name: Hostile Takeover (hostiletakeover)
description:
Try out the demo for free!

This is a tactical shooter game that is based on World Treats, so you will have different equipment and gear for different operators. As the world is on a high alert of Terrorist organizations and criminals, you will travel to  different part of the world to counter this threat. It will have a mission in the Middle East to America and Europe and you will have to survive some hard terrain to survive, so pick your gear carefully. Some missions will be smooth and no need to pack too much as to some more different mission you will have to have more food than ammo.

Features
  • You will have the option to breaching the doors or open it 35 degrees or open it 90 degrees, with also kicking the door open. Also, some functions that you will interact with the door.
  • In real life, the doors are not always open and if you are in hostile territory, for the most part, the doors are located in a way that you will have to check before entering the door
  • I have set up a system that you will have the option to interact with the enemy characters as a form of a fear system that will determine the game style of your enemy
  • You have the option to talk to the AI, still, need more conversations but the system is in the as a dialog set up to ask for information form civilian or interact with the enemy.
  • After the enemy has surrender you have the option to arrest the character that has surrender, you can not arrest an Ai that has not a set of a fear factory, for example, you can not go up to a random civilian an arrest him. He will then tell you that hi is not guilty of nothing.
  • There is also a food and water system that you will have to check to keep alive in different missions.
Under Development.

The game is still under development but I like to share this DEMO with you guys to get some feedback about the game. All contribute go in to make this game the game I like you to play and have fun doing it.

On this DEMO you only have one mission to choice about, but you can test out the shooting range and the office area.

Bug Report

If you have any bug report you can come into my Discord and report them under Mission Bug Report.
https://discord.gg/dGYBCKq

Install instructions

This is a ZIP file, so you will have to Unzip the folder wherever you'd like then open "MyGameLauncher"  Register a user then press login with your new username and password
